A briefe and short discourse of the vertue and operation of balsame with an instruction for those that haue their health to preserue the same. VVhereunto is added Doctor Bullins diet for health. Bullein, William, d. 1576.
[16] p.
[By G. Robinson?] for Iohn Perin, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, Imprinted at London : Anno Domini. 1585.
Printer's name suggested by STC. Signatures: A. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
